heading: HB07868
0: AN ACT ESTABLISHING A NATIONAL FILM MUSEUM AND EXHIBITION PARK, PROVIDING FUNDS THEREFOR AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
status: Pending with the Committee on PUBLIC INFORMATION since 2018-07-30
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB07868
FULL TITLE : AN ACT ESTABLISHING A NATIONAL FILM MUSEUM AND EXHIBITION PARK, PROVIDING FUNDS THEREFOR AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
ABSTRACT : Aims to establish a National Film Museum and Exhibition Park that shall serve as a center for communication and development of all stakeholders of the industry, serve as an exhibition and incubation site for Filipino films, serve as a site for global film festivals, and a one stop shop for concerns relating to the Film Industry.
ALIAS NAME : “National Film Museum and Exhibition Park Act of 2017.”
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : BELARO, SALVADOR JR. B.
DATE FILED : 2018-06-13
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Sy-Alvarado (000 2018-08-07)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON PUBLIC INFORMATION ON 2018-07-30
